entries.title: Production DB Deadlock
entries.description: Circular dependency in transaction logic caused cascading failure during peak load. Required manual session termination.

entries.title: Biome JS Tooling
entries.description: Replaced ESLint and Prettier. 30x faster linting and formatting pipeline. A massive DX improvement for the team.

entries.title: The Value of Strict Typing
entries.description: Moving to strict TypeScript reduced our runtime errors by 40%. It's not just tooling; it's documentation that never lies.

entries.title: Memory Leak in Workers
entries.description: Identified zombie processes in image processing pipeline. Implemented graceful shutdowns and active monitoring on heap usage.

entries.title: "Staff Engineer" Book
entries.description: Essential reading for understanding technical leadership beyond code. It redefined how I approach architectural buy-in.

entries.title: Event Sourcing Patterns
entries.description: Complex domains benefit from storing state changes, not just current state. Audit trails became essentially free.

recentLogs.title: Early Abstractions
recentLogs.desc: Wait for the rule of three before extracting a shared component.

recentLogs.title: API Rate Limiting
recentLogs.desc: Forgot to implement sliding window on the public endpoint.

recentLogs.title: Testing Pyramid
recentLogs.desc: Shifted focus from E2E to integration tests.
